scripts.build: rm deploy/*.zip || echo any .zip file isn't deleted && rm -r deploy/tmf/* || echo build started && cp -r _locales deploy/tmf/ && cp -r functions deploy/tmf/ && cp -r images deploy/tmf/ && cp background.js deploy/tmf/ && cp contents.js deploy/tmf/ && cp manifest.json deploy/tmf/ && cp popup.html deploy/tmf/ && cp popup.js deploy/tmf/ && echo build is complete
